Description.Name: Narc Staythere! Ammo
Description.Details: Designed to slow or stop charging enemy units, the NARC Staythere! ammunition is your key to debuffing the enemy.   Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type.  Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Has 20 shots.
